channel.title: How to make new commands
channel.description: How do u mkae commands for example ::pure - ::master which file do i go to and type in?

item.title: How to make new commands
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

In your client.java search;

command.startsWith("

Underneath the }

add this;

if (command.startsWith("COMMANDHERE") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(0, 100); }

Ok, this is a command on getting items. So you would type like, say… ::xrichie on the server, this will give you 999M right…

“COMMANDHERE” is what you want the name to be. So once your in the server you would have to type ::COMMANDHERE

Change that to w/e… The playerRights >= 2 is saying that admins and up can use this command. Delete it or change it to 0 for everyone

0 - everyone
1- mod+
2- admin+
3-owner+

The

addItem(0, 100);

Is the item ID and how much you will get. So for the first 0 put like 1. That is itemID 1. (idk what item 1 is…)

The 100 is how many of these you will get. So change that to how ever many you want…

You can keep adding the addItem over and over below the addItem one you made

Save & Compile. Run server and type your command.

Read full topic
